I’ve been building professional mobile, web and desktop apps since 2001, using cutting edge frontend technology creatively.

about.title: BACKGROUND
bio: Hi, I’m developer and UX designer based in Sydney. I’ve been building professional mobile, web and desktop apps since 2001, using cutting edge frontend technology creatively.
Currently, I’m primarily working with Javascript using React, Angular, RxJS, SASS, Gulp, EaselJS, Webpack among others. I also have backend skills and can deliver a project from UX to production.
I create organized, scalable code based on OOP. I use REST APIs, and I program with design patterns in mind.

contact.title: CONTACT
introText: If you think I might fit in as a member of your team, if you have a project and would like me to collaborate and give you a hand, or you just want to get in touch, don’t hesitate to drop me a line at:

errors.required: Sorry, I didn't get your name
I need the email to be able to answer to you
